name: Mr. Amo
description:
What is a village without its elder ? 🤔
📜 Elder is the one who takes care of and manages, but not here because the elder disappeared and everyone is not worried at all except for one person: The Cool Guy 😎

📜 In the quest for the ancient, maximize your arsenal to defeat the mine's five guardians, as well as its creator ...

📜Stay focused on the mission, don't let the adventure cool down.

Abuse the cliche of an RPG:
💎Collect Gems

✨Forge Swords

📖Equip Powerful Books

💰Buy Items and Armor

📦Open Chests

🎃Knock down Weird Enemies

🩲Wear Secret Pajamas











...and for the record, you are not the Cool Guy.

Good journey!
